professional history.role: Head of Marketing & Communications, Industrial Designer
professional history.text: Marketing and communications as well as industrial design at SnigelDesign AB (snigel.se) Performed a complete rebranding and built a new website with e-commerce in Wordpress/WooCommerce.</br>Development of carrying systems, ballistic protection and clothes. Design, prototyping, field tests, production specifications, documentation.
Entrepreneur in retail and interior design, Stockholm. Import and Nordic distribution from Pendleton Woolen Mills, USA. Running a brick and mortar store in Vasastaden, Stockholm.

Senior Adviser in Enterprise Content Management. Business development, process mapping, LEAN information management.

Customers: SSAB HQ, ITT-Flygt, Crane, GE Healthcare, Aleris, BTS - Business Training Systems, Foyen, Rödl & Partner, ABB.

Curator at national museum of cultural history. Head of the Picture agency and image archives, developing and marketing the business. A driving force in the launching and implentation of new techniques such as digital image processing and storage. Managing and digitisation of large image collections (+ 6 millions). Consulting national standardisation issues in the field of photography, digital images and metadata. Budgeting and managing 4 to 6 employees.

Developing a picture agency at the Swedish National Heritage Board (Riksantikvarieämbetet, RA) in Stockholm. Planning and evaluation of a cooperation between RA, Historiska museet and Nordiska museet regarding a common agency and website. \nDesign and development of a FileMaker CRM and ERP-system.

Industrial designer; designing, prototyping and construction.Exhibition design. Ergonomics. Head of Computer Aided Design with 3D-solids construction and visualisation (raytracing). Customers such as Ericsson, Nokia, UBI, ICL, Fujitsu.

educational history.organisation: Chas Academy, Stockholm. Higher Vocational Education (YH)
European Commission on Preservation and Access - Amsterdam
educational history.text: Management of photographic collections; history of photography, preservation, digitisation, collection management.
3 years of studies. Psychology 30 högskolepoäng, Theoretical philosophy 60 högskolepoäng, History of Ideas 75 högskolepoäng
4 years. Master of Fine Arts in Industrial Design
Certified designer, Scholarship of 1991 for young industrial designers. CAD-education for UNIX-workstation software

educational history.text: 3 years of College, Liberal Arts degree

service: Member of expert group for National standardisation for registration of photographies. Cooperation between i.a. Kungl. Biblioteket, Riksarkivet, Nationalmuseum and Nordiska museet for Sveriges Fotoråd.
Secretary at Board of BRF Flygaren. Project manager for reconstruction and penthouses with a 27 Msek budget. Responsible for architectural guidelines and preservation.
Managing the press area and artist transports at the Lollipop   and Fanclub festivals 1996-1998.
Member of Board of Marmorlunden BRF. Project manager for reconstruction, procurator   and adviser on mid-century modern architecture
